channel.title: From-0-to-buffer-overflows on Gogo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in From-0-to-buffer-overflows on Gogo's Blog

item.title: Episode 1 Stack Buffer Overflow on Gameboy Color Pokemon Red and Blue Exploitation and Reverse Engineering
item.description: Hello and welcome to my first post. As a first exercise, today we are going to dissect a stack buffer overflow worm present that exploits a vulnerabilty present on the video game pokemon red and blue on gameboy. We will use reverse engineering technics. I choose to use gameboy because this architecture has no mitigation. It is a perfect example. Also the roms of gameboy are unpatchable. It is the definition of ROM: Read Only Memory.
